Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and pink in section, the interior is slightly ribbed, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of four lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394803) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394803)
